title: Mistletoe and Folly
description: Deck the halls and man the barricades--a long Christmas holiday could start fireworks between the guests! After nearly being run down on the road, Jemima arrives at her wealthy aunt's home and discovers that the hell-bent carriage driver is one of her aunt's houseguests! Yuletide season or not, Jemima gives the uppity lord a piece of her mind. Original Regency Romance.
author: Marian Devon
